short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly log your favorite classified ads into your Logbee account

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whether you're looking online for a new home, a used car, a holiday rental or just browsing the classified ads, the Logbee 'log it' button allows you to easily store your favorites into your Logbee account: title, description, link as well as pictures will be automatically retrieved for you. As an additional feature, any text selected on the page will be imported as the description.

You can then comment and rate your findings while keeping a clean overview. And sharing them with friends or family is a breeze!
